summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC. It details the charges incurred, discounts applied, and payment information. The invoice indicates a total amount due of $17.80, with a payment deadline of January 15, 2005.

persons.name: Johnny Ciampi
persons.context: Johnny Ciampi is listed as the recipient associated with the shipment referenced in the invoice.

persons.name: Berry
persons.context: Berry is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the package.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package was delivered to NYSG LLC.

locations: 1075 West Georgia St, Suite 2600, Vancouver, BC V6E 3C9, CA
keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-687-94151, dated December 31, 2004.
Total charges for the FedEx services amount to $17.80 after discounts.
The payment is due by January 15, 2005.
The package was picked up on December 22, 2004, and delivered on December 29, 2004.
There is a mention of a fuel surcharge applied to the invoice.
